I define my role here as a Learning Broker. Consult with business units (underwriting, claims processing, finance) to assess learning and performance needs and provide quality solutions. Design and implement Leadership Development programs. Expertly manage details and high touch strategic situations simultaneously.  Partner with executives to provide learning solutions that meet the business needs. Expert facilitator who can successfully lead a group ranging from 20-200 people.

Designed, developed, and delivered business focused leadership development programs in support of APS values and strategic objectives. Collaborated with HR Business Partners and Organization Effectiveness Specialists to ensure corporate programs are well aligned with business unit goals and strategies.  • Successfully launched enterprise wide leadership immersion program for newly promoted leaders• Created and delivered an interactive learning activity to reinforce leadership development  concepts • Designed Hi-Potential development opportunities in support of Talent Management initiatives for Hi-Po Managers, Hi-Po Directors, Hi-Po VP’s, and C-Suite leaders
Coventry Health Care, an Aetna Company

Provided innovative learning solutions in multiple customer service contact sites for leader and employee development. Conducted performance consulting with business partners on training development needs, including classroom instruction, e-learning, and live distance learning. Consulted with internal clients to provide creative learning solutions designed to meet business needs. Provided training solutions for employees in a constantly changing environment. Collaborative approach to consulting and teamwork.• Led high profile enterprise training initiative of 5,000 leaders across US with 90% completion rate• Expert facilitator in small/large group delivery settings - facilitated up to 200 leaders in one setting • Designed, developed, and implemented enterprise wide new hire orientation and on-boarding programs• Created and implemented a highly effective train the trainer program to develop SME facilitation skills and understanding of adult learning techniques  • Created training development and delivery of new enterprise wide Concur expense system

Amy provided invaluable assistance to my team as we worked to deploy a new Travel and Entertainment Expense system to approximately 32,000 employees along with reissuing approximately 17,000 Corporate Cards.  Amy's experience and insights helped us to develop in person and video conference training materials, recorded presentations, and necessary reference materials along with a delivery plan for all this information.  Overall feedback on the project deployment was extremely positive across the company and leadership was impressed with what we accomplished in the associated timeframe.  We definitely would not have had this level of success without Amy's partnership on the project!

I had the pleasure of working with Amy on many projects that were important to the organization.  I’d use three words to describe her as a learning professional and a facilitator:  prepared, positive and professional.Prepared –Amy spent time understanding the business needs and the “problem to solve” before stepping into the facilitator role.  This level of preparation allowed her to ask questions and make relevant teaching points that translate content from the classroom to desktops.  Her directions are always clear and her stories on point.Positive – In reviewing feedback sheets from a train-the-trainer session, Amy’s peers described her as warm, engaging and enthusiastic when facilitating a group session.  Peers can be our toughest critics and Amy raised the bar with her positive approach.Professional – Amy takes challenging questions and comments and effectively presents them back to the group for discussion.  She knows the difference between offering information and encouraging their discoveries.  Amy is someone you can count on to deliver results and build engagement.

Amy is a talented consultant who has shown a proven ability to build strong relationships with clients. She creates a trusting environment where the client feels comfortable sharing. In addition, she connects with leaders and key resources throughout the company. Using these skills results in Amy being able to discover her clients' true need so that she can offer the appropriate solution. With a strong focus on the corporate strategy, she's able to help leaders align their learning needs to organizational goals. Amy's standard of excellence is hard to match. She's definitely a jewel in the consulting world.

Amy and I have worked together for nearly two years through the Central Ohio chapter of ASTD.  I greatly admire and respect her ability to lead a diverse group of Workplace Learning & Performance professionals.  She does an outstanding job of bringing us together around a unified commitment to improving the state of our profession.  Despite these uncertain economic times, and the fact that Central Ohio ASTD is a volunteer, not-for-profit organization, our chapter has never been stronger nor had a more commited, engaged membership.  She seamlessly transitions between her responsibilities as Chapter President and her role at a Fortune 500 organization, and you would be fortunate to work with Amy on any project relating to Organizational Learning.

summary: A proven Learning and OD professional with extensive experience in designing, developing and implementing innovative and effective solutions. An excellent motivator with a thorough understanding of the adult learning theory who encourages a team focused environment. An experienced leader skilled at managing multiple changing priorities while maintaining operational efficiency. Executive level communication skills with ability to flex to front line employees. A recognized training expert that has been quoted in business publications.  Specialties: * Banking / Insurance / Healthcare* Operational expertise / Process Improvement  * Training expert / Instructional design* Leadership / Team building* Cross functional project management* Needs analysis/ Consulting experience* MS Office, PeopleSoft, Success Factors & Saba LMS/TM
